Devex Job Posting

A redesigned job posting experience that improved user engagement and conversion rates.

Overview

Led the redesign of Devex's job posting experience, focusing on improving user engagement and conversion rates through better UX and visual design.

The Challenge

The existing job posting experience had several issues:

  • Low engagement with job postings
  • Poor conversion rates for job applications
  • Unclear value proposition for employers
  • Outdated visual design

The Solution

Implemented a comprehensive redesign that included:

  • Improved visual hierarchy and readability
  • Enhanced job search and filtering
  • Better mobile experience
  • Clearer call-to-actions

Impact

  • Increased job posting engagement by 45%
  • Improved application conversion rates by 30%
  • Enhanced mobile user experience
  • Better employer satisfaction
